name: Death Moon
description:
Intro _This is a story about Ellen as she has to hunt down gunner an ancient robot set on destroying humans.. Explore and find hidden objects to progress through the story ...Ellen is a bionic human with super abilities to help navigate Death Moon..



Death Moon is a plane filled with mysterious creature which Ellen calls "dogs" which will attack when close by. But these beings are just distraction from the real mission regardless they can still pose a threat.

Game play _Ellen has a gun and a staff which would help kill the enemies and once free Ellen can search for hidden objects hidden by mist which usually mean sits close by..Explore the dense forest as you search and uncover different secretes of the old human civilization.

Ellen does not have a restore point and once you quit or die its all over. But you can still find your way through since Ellen/Player is able to easily recall the artifacts and switches locations to activate and get through the level quickly.



Summary _Ellen does not have a restore point which means die once or quit is game over..And also will have to plan and time reactions correctly to help get through the levels..

Detail of Game play_Avoid spikes which could cost you a life bar
-Try to evade by jumping over pools of acid which instantly drops you back to beginning
-Avoid the Spitter dogs since they shot acid which can distract you, allowing other dogs a chance to attack
-Follow mist to reveal locations of the hidden objects
-Use blocks to climb through areas you could not reach by pushing or jumping onto them
-Activate bridges to help get through bigger holes and obstacles
